welcome_title:
Hi, I’m Ivan
Front end dev
welcome_paragraph:
On this website you can find my projects, articles, information about me, etc.
Make sure you subscribe to get the latest updates
subscribe_for_updates_subtitle: Subscribe to newsletter and never miss the new post.
about_me_paragraph: Hi, mi name is Ivan Peshikov. I am front end developer from Ukraine. I specialize in developing web applications of various complexity. I am constantly learning and developing myself in order to make my work even better. I really like what I do, and I really believe that I will continue to get better and better. If you like my work, please contact me and I can work on your project.
page_not_found: Oops, This Page Could Not Be Found
page_not_found_paragraph: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
enter_username_paragraph: To leave a comment here, please enter your username
maximum_length_username: Username must be no more than 16 characters
minimum_length_username: Username must be at least 4 characters
already_subscribed: This email is already subscribed to updates
unsubscribe_message: I'm understand that you want to spend less time in your inbox. Remember, you can always subscribe again!
dont_worry: but don't worry, i won't take it personally.
